titleStmt.title: A true copy of two speeches spoken by two orphans, educated in Christ-Hospital, on the 13th day of August, 1663 being a day set apart to commemorate God's mercies bestowed on their fellow-brethren, who were formerly educated and brought up in the said hospital.
titleStmt.author: Parker, John.
Brice, Thomas, fl. 1663.

notesStmt.note: First speech signed: John Parker, orphan; second speech signed: Thomas Brice, orphan.
Reproduction of original in: William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles.
